content: first st of round 2 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain 2 space 2 double_crochet increase half_double_crochet increase 2 half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch join the round with a slip_stitch into first st 24 st total plus chain 2 space by frances @ justtoomuchyarn pattern is for the personal use of the purchasing customer only this pattern or its components are not to be sold or reproduced by anyone outside of the creator or her influence under any circumstances finished products may be shared online or sold in limited number by the pattern purchaser with appropriate credit to justtoomuchyarn in the piece description and attached to finished product 6 do not fo continuing off the last slip_stitch chain 30 - or to preferred length slip_stitch into the 3rd single_crochet of the top right corner of the edging slip_stitch across the top edge of the piece until the 3rd single_crochet of the top left corner chain 36 or to preferred length + 6 chain slip_stitch into the 6th chain from your hook in the loop created repeat the instructions for the tie end fo your kerchief should now have two ties with an oval at each end by frances @ justtoomuchyarn pattern is for the personal use of the purchasing customer only this pattern or its components are not to be sold or reproduced by anyone outside of the creator or her influence under any circumstances finished products may be shared online or sold in limited number by the pattern purchaser with appropriate credit to justtoomuchyarn in the piece description and attached to finished product 7 tie end edging work in the round repeat this section for each tie end with colour b - join at the finishing slip_stitch of round 2 of the tie end 4 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet increase 3 half_double_crochet 2 chain picot half_double_crochet 3 double_crochet 4 chain picot 3 double_crochet in chain 2 space half_double_crochet 2 chain picot 3 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase 2 single_crochet 4 slip_stitch slip_stitch to join in first st fo by frances @ justtoomuchyarn pattern is for the personal use of the purchasing customer only this pattern or its components are not to be sold or reproduced by anyone outside of the creator or her influence under any circumstances finished products may be shared online or sold in limited number by the pattern purchaser with appropriate credit to justtoomuchyarn in the piece description and attached to finished product 8 weave in all ends block as desired finished enjoy your new vee-kerchief any questions or concerns contact me at justtoomuchyarn@gmail com for assistance show me your makes by tagging me on instagram and tumblr at @justtoomuchyarn want to buy me a coffee feel free to send me a tip at ko-fi com/justtoomuchyarn by frances @ justtoomuchyarn pattern is for the personal use of the purchasing customer only this pattern or its components are not to be sold or reproduced by anyone outside of the creator or
